text: læa wạn sụ̀ng brrdā p̄hū̂ pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā ca t̄hūk nả mā xyū̀ t̀xh̄n̂āfị nrk (ca mīs̄eīyng kl̀āw k̄hụ̂n ẁā) nī̀ michı̀ khwām cring dxk h̄rụ̄x? Phwk k̄heā kl̀āw ẁā næ̀nxn khrạb k̄hx s̄ābān t̀x phracêā k̄hxng reā phraxngkh̒ trạs̄ ẁā dạngnận phwk k̄hêā cng lîm rs̄ kār lngthos̄ʹ tām thī̀ phwk cêā dị̂ pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā
